mapper.insert: /* issueChecker.insertIssue */ INSERT INTO T_ISSUE ( ISSUEID, SUBJECT, CONTENTS, TYPE, STATE, REGISTERID, CHARGEPERSONID, CREATIONDATE, MODIFICATIONDATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(ISSUEID),0) + 1 FROM T_ISSUE), #{subject}, #{contents}, #{type}, #{state}, #{registerId}, #{chargePersonId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: /* issueChecker.updateIssue */ UPDATE T_ISSUE SET SUBJECT=#{subject}, CONTENTS=#{contents}, TYPE=#{type}, STATE=#{state}, REGISTERID=#{registerId}, CHARGEPERSONID=#{chargePersonId}, MODIFICATIONDATE=SYSDATE WHERE ISSUEID = #{issueId}
mapper.select: /* issueChecker.getIssueDetail */ SELECT ISSUEID , SUBJECT , CONTENTS , TYPE , STATE , (SELECT CDNM FROM T_COMMONCODE WHERE GRPCD='TYPE' AND TYPE = CD) TYPENM , (SELECT CDNM FROM T_COMMONCODE WHERE GRPCD='STATE' AND STATE = CD) STATENM , REGISTERID , CHARGEPERSONID , TO_CHAR(CREATIONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATIONDATE , TO_CHAR(MODIFICATIONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') MODIFICATIONDATE FROM T_ISSUE WHERE ISSUEID = #{issueId}
